paragraphs: [[A stained glass window depicts, to one side, many people laboring  hard, burdened with great loads, and suffering the agonies of war and  death. On the other side the people put down their burdens and are  transfigured by a blazing green light which strips them of their  tattered soiled garments and leaves them in a perfect splendor of body  and spirit. Beneath the window is a simple inscription:]]

Once they struggled, hammered, cried
Fought for justice, honor, pride.
Now from time and tide released
They guard and serve in silent peace
